description.en:
"That girl, is she a monster or a human?"

The story revolves around a girl named Shikimi, who was born with a Mononoke (supernatural creature) attached to her. The particular Mononoke that possesses her is a Satori, which grants her the ability to read human thoughts. However, this also causes her appearance to transform into something monstrous when her emotions become too intense, leading the villagers to treat her as an outcast, calling her a monster.

Shikimi's peaceful life with her mother is shattered when a man-eating Mononoke takes everything from her. After a Purifier named Ogata avenges her mother, Shikimi leaves the village with him. Together, they head to Showa-era Tokyo, where Shikimi embarks on a journey to face supernatural incidents and discover the meaning of her existence — neither fully human nor Mononoke.

A fantasy set in Showa-era Japan, where the protagonist Shikimi navigates a world filled with Mononoke and grapples with her identity.
description.ja: その少女は、物ノ怪か人か──。生まれながらに物ノ怪憑きの少女・しきみ。憑いた“サトリ”の人の心を読む力と感情の昂りで現れる異形の姿から村人に化け物と疎まれるしきみだったが、人食いの物ノ怪により母親との静かな暮らしさえ奪われてしまう。仇を討った祓い屋の男・尾形とともに村を出たしきみは、人でも物ノ怪でもない自らの存在意義を追うために昭和の東京で物ノ怪にまつわる怪異事件と向き合っていく
